description: This file defines a React component 'LoginPage' that provides a login interface for the OceanLMS platform, including handling URL parameters, triggering login via context, and rendering the login UI.

methods.name: LoginPage()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the login page with buttons for email and Google login, and handling URL parameters for redirection and error messages.

methods.name: handleLogin
methods.description: Function that initiates the login process with specified provider ('email' or 'google') by calling the login method from AuthContext.
